title: Traditional Kitchen Nut Milk Bag - Strainer & Cheesecloth Food Grade - Almond Milk, Yogurt and Juice Maker - Cold Brew Coffee Filter – Reusable bags - Fine Mesh Nylon - Perfect quality & size 12"x12"
feature: The TRADITIONAL KITCHEN perfect quality and size 12"X12" NUT MILK BAG! This REUSABLE nut milk bag is a MULTI-FUNCTION Kitchen Tool with dozens of uses, including cold brew coffee filter, homemade juicer, homemade yogurt maker, general use strainer and much, much more. It has more surface area for Faster Squeezing, so it WON’T STRETCH or TEAR!

THE CREATIVE WAY TO KEEP YOUR FAMILY HEALTHY AT HOME.It's EASIER to squeeze for you since it features a LARGE OPENING that leaves plenty of room to squeeze out the milk without it overflowing, as well as 200 micron mesh and PREMIUM double-reinforced nylon stitching that provides 100% protection against pulp and impurities.
FREE RECIPE eBOOK MAILED TO YOU! PERFECT GIFT for FAMILY and FRIENDS!

BETTER THAN ANY CHEESECLOTH. Fast drying and mold free with nylon drawstring. The perfect shape for pouring without spilling, smartly designed with a large opening, which fits over most any container.
description: The TRADITIONAL KITCHEN Nut Milk Bag is the perfect strainer for every kind of milk (almond, soy, rice, coconut, oat, hemp and more), cheese, cold-brew coffee, Greek yogurt, iced-tea, homemade juice and veggies. Our product is Eco Friendly - contains no artificial ingredients or colorings; Premium food grade confirmed by the FDA; Rounded corners for easy using and fast clean up; Tear resistant; LARGE OPENING that leaves plenty of room to squeeze out the milk without it overflowing; PREMIUM double-reinforced nylon stitching that provides 100% protection against pulp and impurities; Fast drying and mold free with nylon drawstring; MULTI-FUNCTION Kitchen Tool that fits over most any container; STRONGEST NYLON FOOD STRAINER AVAILABLE.
